I think the biggest advantage that there

progressive rollouts of feature flags So
it allows more granularity that you you
couldn't do with a binary release You

gradually enable a new feature feature
or functionality of your code And with

usually of disabling If you figure out
something goes wrong into production
just you know quickly disable the
